entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
